list.text:
new note/folder

select folder and 
click on "new note" icon
(in header)

new note will be created 
in folder on top of its list
and folder will automatically 
open

same applies for
"new folder" creation
_________________

if you select note
and click on new note/folder
new note/folder will be 
created UNDER selected note

if multiple notes/folders 
are selected, new note/folder
goes on bottom of root list, 
same if nothing is selected

there is a visual clue for 
new notes/folder

try it....

selecting

single click to select 
notes and folders
(folders will also open/close)

hold CTRL (CMD) to select
multiple notes/folders

select note/folder
and then click another 
holding SHIFT to select range

range can be only on same level
add other with CTRL (CMD)

parents and children 
cannot share same selection
they will kick each other out 
from selection

try to select folder and then 
holding CTRL, select something 
in it, or other way around

this is intended behavior to 
prevent messed data

drag and drop

select single or multiple 
notes and folders
and drag-drop them to 
desired destination

if you drop it on note
dragged item(s) will go 
under that note

if you drop it on folder
when whole folder node is green
dragged item(s) will move
to that folder, on top of its list

if you drop it on folder
when green BOTTOM LINE
is active dragged item(s) 
will go under that folder

if you hover mouse over the 
folder for a second while dragging,
folder will expand

linked note example

double click linked note 
to visit its URL
in current tab


Lykke Li - I Follow Rivers


create linked note by 
selecting any text on 
web page you visit,
right click it and choose
"make note"

it behaves like a bookmark
in which you can add
additional description (here)

however you change 
linked note text,
url won't change

middle click example

will open linked note 
in new active tab


Tribute to the Joker
U2 - Hold Me, Thrill Me, Kiss Me, Kill Me

drag to page example

you can drag and drop
linked notes to web pages
on the right to open them 
in new background tab

single or multi-selection

Massive Attack - Live With Me

text:
click me

-this is simple note
 select it to show its 
 text in this box

-you can type here,
 cut, copy, paste...

-first line is note title

-if title is too long,
 break it with ENTER

-everything you type here
 is saved, no extra
 save buttons or so...

double click me

when you double click
simple note, note text 
is copied into clipboard
so you can paste it 
anywhere you like
(not only in browser forms)

*if you double click linked note,
you will open its url in current tab

resizing

click and hold upper border 
of this box to resize its height
(height is remembered)

width is resized by sidebar

about trash

right click note/folder,
single or multiple selected
and choose "delete selected"

trash icon will indicated 
that there is something in it
(orange color)

you can empty trash 
by right clicking on icon

...or open trash with normal 
(left) click and delete all in it
or restore something by 
right clicking on deleted items
(single or multiple)

*SHIFT won't work in trash
only CTRL

use arrow to go back 
to notes

about tooltips

you can disable 
them in options
(close/open extension
from the sidebar for
change to take effect)

that will disable only 
notes tooltips
(not UI)

I add them only
for notes (not folders)
I think this is less annoying

about search

...it triggers on third letter

and for now searches only notes
(I'll add folders in next ver :P )

list.text:
you can nest folders 
as much as you like

*I know it's silly to explain
but many ppl don't realize it

text:
WARNING!!!

Notes are stored in localStorage
(using chrome.storage API)

if you are using some addons
for clearing extensions localStorage
there is possibility that it 
will wipe Notes data

to be safe, export them first

native browser
"clear browsing data"
is safe to use

some useful stuff

double click note in this folder to copy it into clipboard

examples how you can use notes for special characters or html tags
